dao.interfaces

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDAODB

    public interface CustomerDAO
    A Customer DAO for reading data about customers from the database and inserting new data.
    Author:
    asafs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCustomer(Customer customer)
      Creates a row in the CUSTOMER table, containing the data of customer.
      void createCustomerCoupon(long customer_id, long coupon_id)
      Creates a new row in the CUSTOMER_COUPON join table, containing customer_id and coupon_id.
      void deleteCustomer(long customer_id)
      Deletes a row in the CUSTOMER table, where CUSTOMER.id=customer_id.
      void deleteCustomerCoupons(long customer_id)
      Deletes all CUSTOMER_COUPON rows where CUSTOMER_COUPON.cust_id= customer_id.
      boolean login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      A method that checks the name and password received.
      java.util.Collection<Customer> readAllCustomers()
      Returns a Collection of Customer objects, containing all data from CUSTOMER table.
      Customer readByName(java.lang.String name)
      A method which reads a Coupon by its name from the database.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> readCoupons(long customer_id)
      Returns a Collection of Coupon objects, containing all data from COUPON table, joined by CUSTOMER_COUPON table, where CUSTOMER_COUPON.cust_id=customer_id.
      Customer readCustomer(long customer_id)
      Returns a Customer object containing all data from CUSTOMER table where CUSTOMER.id=customer_id.
      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates a row in the CUSTOMER table, where CUSTOMER.id= customer.id, to customer's data.

      • readCoupons

        java.util.Collection<Coupon> readCoupons(long customer_id)
                                  throws ApplicationException
        Returns a Collection of Coupon objects, containing all data from COUPON table, joined by CUSTOMER_COUPON table, where CUSTOMER_COUPON.cust_id=customer_id. Meaning, returns all of one customer's coupons.
        Parameters:
        customer_id -
        Returns:
        Collection of Coupons
        Throws:
        ApplicationException

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String password)
       throws ApplicationException
        A method that checks the name and password received. If they match a Customer's name in the CUSTOMER.cust_name column and its corresponding CUSTOMER.password, returns true, else returns false.
        Parameters:
        name -
        password -
        Returns:
        true if login successful and false if not.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException

      • createCustomerCoupon

        void createCustomerCoupon(long customer_id,
                          long coupon_id)
                   throws ApplicationException
        Creates a new row in the CUSTOMER_COUPON join table, containing customer_id and coupon_id. Should be used when a Customer purchases a Coupon.
        Parameters:
        customer_id -
        coupon_id -
        Throws:
        ApplicationException

      • deleteCustomerCoupons

        void deleteCustomerCoupons(long customer_id)
                    throws ApplicationException
        Deletes all CUSTOMER_COUPON rows where CUSTOMER_COUPON.cust_id= customer_id. Should be used when a client is deleted from the system and all of his coupons need to be deleted as well.
        Parameters:
        customer_id -
        Throws:
        ApplicationException

        Returns:
        Coupon
        Throws:
        ApplicationException
